item.title: Telegram CEO Pavel Durov Reveals Secret To Hiring Top Engineers: Win A Coding Contest Or Forget It
item.description: Telegram CEO Pavel Durov believes coding contests are the best way to build a top engineering team, preferring active users as candidates. read more

item.title: Leasing A Tesla Just Got Pricier: Elon Musk-Led EV Giant Hikes Prices As $7,500 Tax Credits Expire
item.description: Tesla hiked lease prices for all its vehicles in the US, its website showed on Wednesday, after the $7,500 federal tax credit expired. read more

item.title: AES Corp Stock Jumps Over 14% In Pre-Market On $38 Billion BlackRock Deal Report
item.description: BlackRock's Global Infrastructure Partners is nearing a $38 billion acquisition of AES following reports of a deal with the utility company. read more
